title: One bedroom One Bath, Spacious and walk in closet! 24hr gym!
posting_body: Situated in a fantastic neighborhood in Seattle, WA, Verse Seattle is within walking distance of tasty eateries, coffeehouses, and recreation.

The neighborhood boasts a rich musical past – it’s where the hard rock notes of Jimi Hendrix and never-heard-before soul sounds of Ray Charles began to take shape – and it’s reflected in the pride of the locals.
Our beautifully renovated studio, one, and two-bedroom apartments are less than two miles from downtown and offer easy access to I-5 and I-90.
With everything you need mere steps from our community, you’ll enjoy urban living at its finest.
At Verse Seattle, we crafted our community around your modern Seattle, WA, lifestyle.
The spacious open floor plans were thoughtfully designed for easy living.
Modern kitchens with sleek stainless-steel appliances and quartz counter tops are a wonderful place to sip your morning coffee.
The living spaces offer abundant light and plenty of space for your favorite furnishings.
You will also enjoy the convenience of an in-home washer and dryer and spacious closets for your wardrobe and essentials.
With a studio, one, or two-bedroom apartment at Verse Seattle, you can easily access the most exciting spots in Seattle, WA.
Take a short walk from your Central District neighborhood apartment to catch the streetcar or hop on your bike and make it to downtown Seattle, Pioneer Square, or Pike Place Market within minutes.
Pratt Fine Arts Center is just around the corner, and Seattle University is just one mile away.
Enjoy amazing arts and cultural opportunities with the Seattle Art Museum, Olympic Sculpture Park, and The Museum of Pop Culture within easy reach.
In home washer/dryer, Dishwasher, Quartz counter tops*, high ceilings*, Walk-in closets and so much more.
Community Features: 24-hour Fitness Center, Controlled Access Garage parking, Business Center, Close to Pratt Park, Resident Clubhouse, and so much more.
